post.author: scorpion122
post.body:
hi.
how are you all?
hope you are fine i hadnt time the last years for look into.

post.author: Final_Light
post.body:
huh ?

umm i'm fine

... thread lock ?

post.author: LDAsh
post.body:
What a greeting.
"uhh yeah whatever dude nowDESTROY HIS THREAD!!!"

And lock this thread and let's all post 1000 pointless assumptions about Doom5 while ignoring important topics about Doom3. Actually I had a premonition, that I'd come here and see a long line of posts about The Dark Knight, while people who are still actually doing Doom3 development get almost nothing. Crumbs. Sure enough that happened. If it weren't for a few good ones left like rich_is_bored and The Happy Friar, this place would be http://www.anythingbutdoom3world.org.

What will locking this thread achieve besides driving people away?

post.author: Darkr0nin
post.body: I'm at a loss as to the point of this thread.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
LDAsh wrote:
If it weren't for a few good ones left like rich_is_bored and The Happy Friar, this place would be http://www.anythingbutdoom3world.org.


Yeah! Theoretical work counts!

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
scorpion122 wrote:
hope you are fine i hadnt time the last years for look into.


Z-Hunter, Event Horizon, Lego-BubbaTep.... GET THEM. FRIGGEN AWESOME.

filled you in on the big new releases in the last two years. (might be more but those are the ones currently on my backup folder)

I think it's worth pointing out those three mods are totally awesome. Some mod's for some engines are very similar and aren't anything to go "Holy Crap, that's sweet!" to, but those three are. Even with other mods out there, those ones stand out.

post.author: Ivan_the_B
post.body:
scorpion122 wrote:
hi.
how are you all?
hope you are fine i hadnt time the last years for look into.

Hi.
I don't remember you, but... welcome back!

You forgot In Hell mod, I'm currently giving that a 3rd playthrough right now.

post.author: qwertz123
post.body: i feel really important too but no one likes to actually greet me.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
qwertz123 wrote:
i feel really important too but no one likes to actually greet me.


ask more doom 3 engine related questions, i'm sure people would love to greet you.

post.author: Douglas Quaid
post.body:
Final_Light wrote:
huh ?

umm i'm fine

... thread lock ?


Look at "...threadlock ?" like Final Light didn't know what a threadlock was. Thread lock, what's a threadlock? Humor always wins muhahahahaha. Oh by the way... Hey there Mr. Scorpio long time no see.

P.S. I have absolutely no idea who scorpion122 is
